List<JBCXM__PickList__c> todeleteList = [SELECT id from JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__CATEGORY__C = category];
System.debug('Total event picklist that will be deleted : '+todeleteList.size());
delete todeleteList;
List<JBCXM__PickList__c> pkList = new List<JBCXM__PickList__c>();
List<String> eventNameList = new List<String>{'Quarterly Business Review', 'Quarterly Business Review', 'Weekly Business Review',
								'Sprint Planning', 'Sprint Review', 'Sprint Retrospection', 'Low NPS Score Event', 'Customer On-Boarding',
								'Survey Response Event'};
String category = 'SalesRep Name';
JBCXM__PickList__c event = null
integer i =1;
for(String eventName : eventNameList) {
	event = new JBCXM__PickList__c(Name = eventName,
											JBCXM__CATEGORY__C = category,
											JBCXM__DISPLAYORDER__C = i,
											JBCXM__SYSTEMNAME__C = eventName);

	pkList.add(event);
	i++;
}
System.debug('Total event pick list inserted :' +pkList.size());
insert pkList;
